landing.heroSubtitle: App Geocercas lets you assign people to zones, log activities and calculate costs in real time.
landing.bulletGeocercasBody: Create and manage geofences for your fields, farms, plants or service locations.
landing.bulletPersonalBody: Register your staff and assign them to activities and specific zones.
landing.bulletCostsBody: View Power BI–style dashboards with costs per person, activity and geofence.
landing.assistanceControlBody: Check who was inside each geofence, at what time and in which activity.
landing.multiOrgBody: Manage multiple companies or projects from a single account with separate roles and permissions.
